transportAdvice: Edmonton has a light rail transit system and an extensive bus network that connects major attractions, downtown, and surrounding neighbourhoods, making public transit a practical option for most tourists. Taxis and ride-hailing vehicles are widely available, though walking is most pleasant in summer as winters can be extremely cold.
